DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Measurable Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether a lesion or site of disease is measurable.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Measurable Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._Capable of being measured.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: Capable of being measured.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
